name: Akebono Clicker
description:
Kono Kuso Teitoku!

-----------------------------------------

Patch Notes:

v1.02 from Vyrium - 11/04/2017

  • Can now be played in browser! (save data remains after closing page)
  • Updated UI
  • Damage numbers
  • Optimisation
  • Added Android version download for mobile users

v1.01 - 10/04/2017

  • Added auto save data functionality.
  • Added option to delete save data and reset the game.
  • Added more images.
  • Changed game values.

v.1.00 - 10/04/2017

  • First build of game.
